name: The Docks
description:
Constantly active with ships arriving and departing, the docks are the lifeblood of New Cove. Ropes creak, hulls groan, and sailors shout over the endless motion of the sea. This is where you first arrived on the Refound Continent.

Near a mooring post sits a rain-dark barrel stuffed with driftwood sticks. A few look loose, as if they could be pulled free or knocked loose with little effort.

interactables.name: barrel of sticks
interactables.examine_text: A battered barrel packed with salt-bleached driftwood. The sticks are straight enough to swing, splintery enough to regret.

take.empty_text: The barrel's been picked clean for now.
